authentication.getStarted: To get started, enter the workspace name associated with your account.
authentication.noAccount: Does your team not yet have an account?
authentication.policyAgreement: By registering an account, you agree to the following
authentication.privacyConsent: I consent to the collection and storage of my information to handle the processing and operation of my account.

forgotAccountDetails.header: Can't remember your workspace name, or password?
forgotAccountDetails.description: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions on how to get back into your account.

workspaceModal.title: What is my workspace name?
workspaceModal.body:
Team or organization, every group has a private workspace.
A workspace consists of group members, who collaborate together on projects.

You can find your workspace name on the introductory email you received when you created a new account, or were invited to an existing workspace.

If you can't remember your workspace name, we can help you get back into your account. What would you like to do?
workspaceModal.forgotWorkspace: Help me get back into my account
workspaceModal.newWorkspace: I want to create a new workspace for my team

login.title: Sign In to your Account | $t(site.name)
login.description: Enter your username and password to sign into your account.

register.title: Register for an Account | $t(site.name)
register.description: Complete your registration details to create a client account.

forgot.title: Forgot Account Details | $t(site.name)
forgot.description: Enter your email address to reset your account.

error.outdatedBrowser: Hey! You are using an out-of-date web browser version. This might cause compatibility issues with our service. Please consider upgrading your browser.

validation.validCharactersAZ09: can only contain characters from a-z and 0-9, and no spaces
validation.invalidPasswordSupplied: Invalid password supplied. Please enter a valid password.
validation.userDoesNotExist: A user with this email address does not exist
validation.loadUserPropertiesFailed: User properties could not be successfully loaded
